description: This file defines a UserService class in a Java Spring Boot application, implementing user management features including registration, verification, and integration with Spring Security via UserDetailsService.

classes.name: UserService
classes.description: A service class that manages user registration, verification, and loading user details for authentication, integrating with Spring Security.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with the provided username and password after checking for username availability, encodes password, and saves user.

methods.name: verify
methods.description: Verifies if the provided raw password matches the stored password for the given username.

methods.name: getByUsername
methods.description: Retrieves a User entity by username, throws exception if not found.

methods.name: loadUserByUsername
methods.description: Loads user details required by Spring Security for authentication, returning a UserDetails object.
